Alexis Tsipras (,; born 28 July 1974) is a Greek politician. He is thr Leader of the Opposition since 2019. He has been a member of Syriza since 2013. He was Prime Minister of Greece from 2015 to 2019.
Tsipras is a member of the Syriza party, and is a democratic socialist. A major issue of his term has been dealing with the Greek debt crisis.
